items.title: School Opens in Murcia
items.summary: King's College Murcia opened as the first British school in the Region of Murcia with 65 students.
items.details: The school was founded in September 2007 as a joint project between King's Group and Polaris World, becoming the first British educational centre in the Murcia region and initially enrolling 65 students.

items.title: Expansion of Student Age Range
items.summary: The school developed into a full educational pathway from early years to sixth form.
items.details: King's College Murcia expanded to educate students from approximately 18 months to 18 years old, providing a continuous British-curriculum education through to university preparation.

items.title: International Reputation Strengthens
items.summary: The school gained recognition for academic excellence and strong student outcomes.
items.details: Through strong academic results and British-curriculum teaching, the school built a growing international reputation and became a reference educational centre in the Murcia region.

items.title: External Inspection Confirms Quality
items.summary: Independent inspection evaluated curriculum, teaching, and student development.
items.details: An external inspection reviewed the quality of curriculum, teaching and learning, and students' spiritual, moral, social, and cultural development, confirming strong educational standards.

items.title: British Schools Overseas Establishment Status
items.summary: The school was formally listed within the British Schools Overseas framework.
items.details: King's College Murcia received official establishment recognition within the British Schools Overseas system, reinforcing its compliance with UK educational standards.

items.title: Student Population Exceeds 500
items.summary: Enrollment surpassed 500 students across all age groups.
items.details: The school grew significantly from its original cohort, reaching more than 500 students aged 18 months to 18 years and strengthening its role in regional education.

items.title: Outstanding External Inspection Ratings
items.summary: The school achieved 'Outstanding' ratings across inspection categories.
items.details: Regular external inspections approved by British Schools Overseas awarded the school an 'Outstanding' rating in all categories, highlighting exceptional teaching and learning quality.

items.title: Recognised as World-Class High Performance Learning School
items.summary: King's College Murcia received international HPL distinction.
items.details: The school was recognised as a world-class High Performance Learning institution, reflecting strong academic outcomes and development of advanced thinking skills among students.

items.title: Community Open Day Event
items.summary: Families visited the campus to explore facilities and educational approach.
items.details: An Open Day invited prospective families to meet staff, tour facilities, and learn about the personalised British education offered from early years through sixth form.

items.title: Recognition Among Spain's Leading Schools
items.summary: The school was ranked among top institutions in Spain.
items.details: Prestigious publications highlighted King's College Murcia as one of the best schools in Spain, reflecting sustained academic excellence and institutional growth.
